code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Home from'./components/Home';import Quiz from'./components/Quiz';import{Howl}from'howler';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[quizStarted,setQuizStarted]=useState(false);const[quizData,setQuizData]=useState(null);const[showResult,setShowResult]=useState(false);const[score,setScore]=useState(0);const[timeSpent,setTimeSpent]=useState(0);const[backgroundMusic,setBackgroundMusic]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const music=new Howl({src:[`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/sounds/background.mp3`],loop:true,volume:0.5});setBackgroundMusic(music);return()=>{music.stop();};},[]);const startQuiz=data=>{setQuizData(data);setQuizStarted(true);backgroundMusic.play();setTimeSpent(0);};const finishQuiz=()=>{backgroundMusic.stop();setShowResult(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:!quizStarted?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{startQuiz:startQuiz}):showResult?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result animated",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Quiz Completed!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Your score: ",score]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Time spent: ",timeSpent," seconds"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setQuizStarted(false);setShowResult(false);setScore(0);},children:"Restart Quiz"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Quiz,{data:quizData,onFinish:finishQuiz,setScore:setScore,setTimeSpent:setTimeSpent})});};export default App;
